quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: So basically my safety is sacrificed now, for the sake of paperwork later.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I understand why you’d see it that way, and I’ve told them that immediate risk needs addressing too.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Telling them isn’t the same as action. Nothing’s changing.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I know, and I share your frustration.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: You’re right, it doesn’t, and I’ll keep pressing for actual action.

contradictions.issue: Victim highlights safety sacrificed for paperwork; advocate concedes but only offers continued pressing, no solution
